path.description: The path to the directory to list. If not provided, lists the current directory.

all.description: If true, shows all files, including hidden ones (those starting with a dot).

long_format.description: If true, shows detailed information for each file, such as permissions, ownership, and size.

human_readable.description: If true, displays file sizes in human-readable format (e.g., KB, MB).

recursive.description: If true, lists the contents of subdirectories recursively.

sort_by.description: Specifies the sorting criteria. Options include 'name', 'size', 'time', etc.
